snippet: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose six points, or 0.3 percent, to 2,038 as the market extended a three-week advance.
abstract: Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index and Dow Jones industrial average edge up to nominal highs on day light with economic news and company releases.
lead_paragraph: The Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose six points, or 0.3 percent, to 2,038 as the market extended a three-week advance.

headline.main: Market Continues Its Winning Streak With Another Closing High
headline.print_headline: With Little to Deter Them, Markets Tick Upward
